sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Button } from '../components/ui/Button.jsx'; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '../components/ui/Card.jsx'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext.jsx'; const DashboardPage = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); return (
{/* Navigation */}
Travel Rogue
Dashboard My Plans Community
Welcome, {user?.name}
{/* Main Content */}

Dashboard

Welcome back! Here's an overview of your travel planning activity.

{/* Quick Actions */}
Total Plans
0

Plans created

 Active Trips
0

Upcoming trips

 Total Budget
$0

Planned expenses

 Destinations
0

Cities planned
{/* Quick Actions */}
Quick Actions Get started with your next adventure Recent Activity Your latest travel planning activity

No activity yet

Start by creating your first travel plan!
); }; export default DashboardPage;
